SA20n1295:4: utpāditacitto bodhisattvaḥ śuvidarśanābhūmi madhiṣṭhito dṭaḍhmādāvutpādayati samyakpraṇidhānaṃ saṃgrahītuṃ sarvānaprameyānsattvān |
SA20n1295:8: kāmaye yanmayā purā janmanīhacānena kāyena yadavaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ tadutsṛjāmyaparmantebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyaḥ |
SA20n1295:10: kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ praṇidhānametanme saṃvarddheta jātau jātau ca jāyeta nityaṃ cittānubaddhaṃ na kadāpi vismriyeta dhāraṇyā ca parikṣyeta |
SA20n1295:11: kāmaye yadahaṃ pariṇāmya mahābodhāvanena kuśalamūlena sarvajātinivāseṣu nityaṃ pūjayeyaṃ sarvabuddhānna kadāpyabuddhakṣetreṣu saṃbhaveyam |
SA20n1295:12: kāmaye yadahamutpadya buddhakṣetre ṣūpagaccheyaṃ buddhānupatiṣṭheyaṃ buddhāñchāyeva śarīramanugataḥ kṣaṇamapi na dūrībhaveyaṃ buddhebhyaḥ |
SA20n1295:13: kāmaye yadahamupagato buddhāṃstai ryathākāmaṃ mamārthāya deśitena dharmeṇa niṣpādayeyaṃ bodhisattvapaṃcābhijñānāni |
SA20n1295:14: kāmaye yadahaṃ niṣpādya bodhisattvapaṃcābhijñānāni saṃvṛtisatyaṃ vijñaptiprasṛtaṃ pratibudhya paramārthasatyaṃ bhṛtasvamāvaṃ parijñāya prāpnuyāṃ samyagdharmajñānam |
SA20n1295:15: kāmaye yadahaṃ prāpya samyagdharmajñānamaviśrāntacittena deśayeyaṃ sattvebhyo nidarśayitumupadeśahitān ababodhayituṃ ca tānsarvān |
SA20n1295:16: kāmaye yadahamababodhya sarvānsattvānbuddhānubhāvena gaccheyaṃ daśadikṣu niravaśeṣeṣu lokadhātuṣu pūjatituṃ buddhāñchrotuṃ saddarmān saṃparigrahītuṃ sattvān |
SA20n1295:17: kāmaye yadahaṃ buddhakṣetreṣu saddharmamudgṛhyānupravarteyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dharmacakram |
SA20n1295:18: daśadi kathātuṣu sarvesattvā mama deśanāṃ śrutvā mama nāmākarṇya parityajantu sarvānkleśānu dayantu bodhicittam |
SA20n1295:19: kāmaye yadahaṃ sarvasattveṣu bodhicittamutpādya nityaṃ paripāluyituṃ parihareyamalābhaṃ prapaccheyamaprameyasukhānyutsṛjeyaṃ jīvitaṃ dhanānicoddhareyaṃ sattvānudvaheyaṃ saddharmam |
SA20n1295:20: kāmaye yadahaṃ saddharmamudūḍhaya caritvāpi saddharmaṃ cittena nācareyam |
SA20n1295:21: yathā sattvā ācaritadharmāṇo'pi nācaritadharmāṇo na ca nācaritadharmāṇaḥ |
SA20n1295:25: yadi ca sattvānāṃ samāptiḥ syānmama dhānānāmapi samāptirbhavet |
SA20n1295:26: naca khalu sattvānāṃ samāptistena mama praṇidhānānāmapi na samāptiḥ ||
SA20n1295:33: saṃkṣepata ucyate ṣaḍimāḥ pāramitā bodheḥ samyaghetuḥ |
SA20n1295:34: catvāro brahmavihārāḥ saptaviśadbodhipākṣikā dharmā sahasraśaḥ kuśalācārāḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pūrayitāraḥ |
SA20n1295:35: yadi bodhisattva ācarati ṣaṭ pāramitāstadanusṛtya carati caryāṃ krameṇopaityanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim ||
SA20n1295:38: bodhisattvo damayati ṣaḍindriyāṇi na pramādyati cedācarituṃ śaknoti ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ |
SA20n1295:39: bodhisattvaścittamutpādya pratiṣṭhāpayati sthairyaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhāpayati dṭaḍhaṃ praṇidhānam |
SA20n1295:40: praṇihitaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya na kadāpi pramādyati na ca bhavati kusīdo na ca dīrghasūtraḥ |
SA20n1295:48: tathācānuśaṃsitaṃ bhagavatā tathāgatai rmahāprājñai rbhahāprājñai rbhagavadbhi vyākhyāteṣu guṇeṣu kṣāntiprajñāpuṇyavalānāmadhigameṣu praṇidhānabalamuttamamiti ||
SA20n1295:50: yadi kaścidāyāti bahubidhaṃ yācituṃ tadahaṃ dadāmi yāvannotpādayāmi kṣaṇamapi mātsaryacittam |
SA20n1295:51: kṣaṇamapinimeṣamapyutpādaya nnaśubhacittaṃ dānapratyayena cedgaveṣayāmi śubhavipākaṃ tadahaṃ pratārayāmi daśadikṣu bhagavato'prameyānāparyantānasaṃkhyeyān pratputpannāṃstathāgatān anāgate'śvanyapi na pūrayeyaṃ dhruvamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim |
SA20n1295:53: pratiṣṭhāpayāmi pariśūddhaṃ cittaṃ praṇidadhāmi yanna pratinivarte nānuśocāmi |
SA20n1295:54: yadyamācarāmi kṣāntiṃ pareṇākrāntaḥ pratyaṃgaṃ vibhajyamāno'pi cchidyamāno'pyutpādayāmi nityaṃ maitrīṃ praṇidadhāmi yannācareyaṃ dveṣam |
SA20n1295:55: yadyahamācarāmi vīryamupalabhya śītoṣṇarājadasyujalāgnisiṃhavyāghravṛkanirjakāntārān dṭaḍhikaromi cittaṃ praṇidadhāmi yanna pratinivarte |
SA20n1295:56: yadyahaṃ bhāvayāmi dhyānaṃ bāhyai rvastubhiḥ kliśyamāno'pi vyākulacittau'pyanubadhnāmi smṛtiṃ karmasthāne |
SA20n1295:60: yadyahaṃ nimeṣamapi kṣaṇamapyanuśocandviṣan pratinivartamānaḥ saṃjñāṃ vikṣipan dvaitadṭaṣṭimutpādayañchilakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñābhiḥ śubhavipākaṃ gaveṣayāmi tadahaṃ pratārayāmi daśadiglokadhātuṣvaprameyānaparyantānasaṃkhyeyān pratyutpannāṃstathāgatān |
SA20n1295:66: ( iti bodhicittotpādasutraśātre praṇidhānaṃ nāma tṛtīyo vargaḥ || )
